title: Data in a report is doubly stored
description: When generating reports in our software, we've identified an issue where data is being stored twice, leading to inaccurate reports and increased storage usage.
OB: Data in a report is doubly stored, We currently store data twice.
EB: Data in a report should be stored only once to ensure accurate reports and efficient storage usage.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software and log in to your account.
2. Navigate to the 'Reports' section.
3. Generate a report by selecting the desired parameters.
4. Review the generated report and check the data storage. You will notice that the data is stored twice.
